intension: Create a promotional graphic for healthy and nutritious foods that are beneficial for brain health.
globalcaption: The image features a white background with a variety of brain-healthy foods displayed on it. There are several nuts, including almonds and walnuts, scattered across the background. Some of the nuts are placed closer to the top of the image, while others are positioned more towards the bottom. The arrangement of the nuts creates a visually appealing and appetizing display.
keywords: food, healthy, nutrition, nuts, organic, snack, vegan, vegetarian, white, post

bglayer.bgcaption: The image is a white background with a variety of food items displayed on it. There are several pieces of broccoli, some of which are placed in the top left corner, while others are scattered throughout the middle and bottom sections of the image. Additionally, there are multiple almonds in various positions, with some in the top right corner and others in the middle and bottom sections. The combination of broccoli and almonds creates a visually appealing and healthy food display
